title: shrshTi sthityantakaariNi
sahitya:
shrSTi sthityantakAriNi jaganmOhini



anupallavi



 aSTAdasha vAdaya nAda AnandalOlE iSThArthava nIDu jananI hima shailabAlE



caraNam



 vanaja bhavEndrAdi dEva vandanIya padmapadE sanaka sananda nAtyakhila sAdhujanA bhayapradE

kanaka kashipu ripu sOdari kAncana vasanE dhanapati sakha harikEsha sati salahennanu
